channel.title: Runserver.bat error
channel.description: Voule Auto restart Could not find process: java Restarting server Online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0 .5" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2061) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:552) at server.main(server.java:111) It says that when i run my server bat but the compiler works fine and i can log into my client but i get connection lost very quickly

item.title: Runserver.bat error
item.dc:creator: @underdrive underdrive
item.description:
@underdrive wrote:

yea that was it i put 0.6 in there thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Yep, 0.5 is not an integer, so it cannot be used there.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat error
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:3, topic:367852”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=463998.msg3393823#msg3393823 date=1289158084]
Well, you put something that did not needed to be in the Autospawn.Cfg, hence the “NumberFormatException”.
[/quote]
Wrong,

NumberFormatException means you didn’t use the tabs key in your autospawn config, just go back and edit what you just added, but use the tabs key not the space bar. ;).[/quote]
Thanks.
Figuring he had something of the value of 0.5 – oh well.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat error
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Well, you put something that did not needed to be in the Autospawn.Cfg, hence the “NumberFormatException”.

Wrong,

NumberFormatException means you didn’t use the tabs key in your autospawn config, just go back and edit what you just added, but use the tabs key not the space bar. ;).

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat error
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well, you put something that did not needed to be in the Autospawn.Cfg, hence the “NumberFormatException”.

item.title: Runserver.bat error
item.dc:creator: @underdrive underdrive
item.description:
@underdrive wrote:

Voule Auto restart
Could not find process: java
Restarting server
Online.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “0
.5”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2061)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:552)
at server.main(server.java:111)
It says that when i run my server bat but the compiler works fine and i can log into my client but i get connection lost very quickly

Read full topic
